text: Madis Milling (24 November 1970 â€“ 3 February 2022) was an Estonian actor, television and radio presenter and politician. He was born in Tallinn, Estonia. He was a host in many radio stations, including Sky Plus, Vikerraadio, Radio Kuku. From 2003, he was a member of Estonian Reform Party. He was a member of the Riigikogu from 2015 until his death. Milling died on 3 February 2022 from cardiac arrest while volunteering as a firefighter to help stop a fire in Lokuti, Estonia at the age of 51. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Estonian movie actors Category:Estonian television actors Category:Television personalities Category:Radio personalities Category:Politicians from Tallinn Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest
title: Madis Milling
